title.narrative: HOPs - Evidence-Based Knowledge for Development (K4D) – a service delivering evidence and knowledge through collaborative lesson learning

description.narrative: This activity (HOPs - Evidence-Based Knowledge for Development (K4D) – a service delivering evidence and knowledge through collaborative lesson learning) is a component of Evidence-Based Knowledge for Development (K4D) – a service delivering evidence and knowledge through collaborative lesson learning reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £9,562,036. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Health policy and administrative management, Public sector policy and administrative management, Social Protection, Business Policy and Administration, Environmental policy and administrative management, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Institute of Development Studies. The start date is 01-08-2016 and the end date is 31-07-2021.
